alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:05PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Goodhue County through 545 PM CDT... At 505 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wanamingo, or 14 miles north of Mantorville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Zumbrota around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pine Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities.
